Neighbors Factory¶

class NeighborsFactory.NeighborsFactory[source]¶

Find neighbors of a given points using different methods. Use this factory to create either PointNeighbors or NeighborProperty for a whole point cloud.

Methods

CalculateAllPointsNeighbors(pointset[, …])
GetNeighborsIn3dRange(points, x, y, z, radius) Find all tokens (points) in radius range
GetNeighborsIn3dRange_BallTree(pnt, pntSet, …) Find neighbors of a point using KDtree
GetNeighborsIn3dRange_KDtree(ind, pntSet, radius) Find neighbors of a point using KDtree
GetNeighborsIn3dRange_SphericCoord(pnt, …) Find points in defined window - neighbors of a point
GetPointNeighborsByCoordinates(…[, …]) Define a point’s neighborhood according to its coordinates
GetPointsNeighborsByID(pointset3d, idx, …) Get the neighbors of a point within a point cloud by its index.
static CalculateAllPointsNeighbors(pointset, searchRadius=0.05, maxNN=20, maxProcesses=8)[source]¶
static GetNeighborsIn3dRange(points, x, y, z, radius)[source]¶

Find all tokens (points) in radius range

Find all points in range of the ball field with radius ‘radius’.

Parameters:
  • points (PointSet) –
    • PointSet
  • y z (x) – search point coordinates
  • radius – Radius of ball field
Returns:

points in ranges
Return type:

PointSubSet
static GetNeighborsIn3dRange_BallTree(pnt, pntSet, radius, tree=None, num_neighbor=None)[source]¶

Find neighbors of a point using KDtree

Parameters:
  • pnt (tuple?) – search point coordinates
  • pntSet (PointSet.PointSet) – pointset - in cartesian coordinates
  • radius (float) – search radius
  • tree (BallTree) – ball tree
  • num_neighbor (int) – number of nearest neighbors if num_neighbor!=None the result will be the exact number of neighbors and not neighbors in radius
Returns:

neighbors
Return type:

PointSubSet
static GetNeighborsIn3dRange_KDtree(ind, pntSet, radius, tree=None, num_neighbor=None)[source]¶

Find neighbors of a point using KDtree

Parameters:
  • ind (int) – search point coordinates
  • pntSet (PointSet.PointSet) – the points in which the neighbors are required - in cartesian coordinates
  • radius – search radius
  • tree (cKDTree) – KD tree
  • num_neighbor (int) – number of nearest neighbors if num_neighbor!=None the result will be the exact number of neighbors and not neighbors in radius
Returns:

subset of neighbors from original pointset
Return type:

PointSubSet
static GetNeighborsIn3dRange_SphericCoord(pnt, points, radius)[source]¶

Find points in defined window - neighbors of a point

Parameters:
  • pnt (tuple?) – search point coordinates
  • points (PointSet.PointSet) – pointset - in spherical coordinates
  • radius (float) – search radius in radian
Returns:

neighbors from original pointset
Return type:

PointSubSet
static GetPointNeighborsByCoordinates(pointset_open3d, point, searchRadius, maxNN, useOriginal=False)[source]¶

Define a point’s neighborhood according to its coordinates

Parameters:
  • pointset_open3d (PointSetOpen3D) – the point cloud in which the neighbors should be searched
  • point (np.ndarray or tuple) – x, y, z of the point
  • searchRadius (float) – the radius in which the neighbors should be searched
  • maxNN (int) – the maximum number of neighbors
  • useOriginal (bool) –

    ???
Returns:

the neighborhood of a point
Return type:

PointNeighborhood

static GetPointsNeighborsByID(pointset3d, idx, searchRadius, maxNN, returnValues=True, neighborsProperty=None, override=False, useOriginal=False, rotate=False)[source]¶

Get the neighbors of a point within a point cloud by its index.

Parameters:
  • pointset3d (PointSetOpen3D) – the cloud in which the point is searched for
  • idx (int or np.ndarray) – point index
  • searchRadius (float) – the search radius for neighbors
  • maxNN (int) – maximum number of neighbors
  • returnValues (bool) – default: True
  • neighborsProperty (NeighborsProperty) – Existing neighborhood property which should be override
  • override (bool) – default: False
  • rotate (bool) – flag whether to rotate the neighborhood or not. Default: False
  • useOriginal (bool) – default: False
Returns:

the neighborhood property
Return type:

NeighborsProperty
